description: Shiverz is shakin’ up the shaved ice scene in San Antonio with their shockingly natural, all-sugar syrups. At Shiverz, you can find all of your classic faves to flavor their soft, fluffy ice, like Lemon Lime, Blue Raspberry, Strawberry, and more, as well as a cool exotic selection, like Ninja Turtle or Pickanerd (tangy pickle juice flavor with a sweet sprinkle of Nerd candies). Need to quench your sweet tooth? Take this advice: You just gotta quiver your way over to Shiverz Shaved Ice.
name: Shiverz Shaved Ice
